FindMaximum2 Class Reference

Public Methods

void Fit (ColumnVector &, int)

Detailed Description

Non-linear optimization Class. Part of the newmat library. FindMaximum2 is the basic optimization strategy when one is doing an optimisation where one has first derivatives and estimates of the second derivatives. See FindMaximum2.cpp for details and examples.
